Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to be performed after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for the segment starting at Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and ending at SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 defined as the duration until the next decisive activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Declined in cases where agreement was not reached
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to the subsequent execution of SW-AE Assign Reviewers when a new reviewer is selected
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that proceed to editorial assessment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 measured from its occurrence to the completion of the entire peer review phase (ending at SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, or similar final decision)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the next occurrence of Assign a Different Editor, indicating escalation due to reviewer unresponsiveness
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Minimum time it takes from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to the submission of a Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in multi-round revision scenarios
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and Unassign Reviewer, reflecting administrative cleanup following non-response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Unassign Reviewer'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer No Response in traces where no further reviewer response occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
